#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int w[101][101];

int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int m,n,ans=-100000000;
		scanf("%d%d",&m,&n);
		for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
		{
            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
            {
                scanf("%d",&w[i][j]);
            }
		}
		for(int i=1;i<=m;i++)
		{
            for(int j=1;j<=n;j++)
            {
                int temp=w[i][j];
                int x1=i,y1=j,x2=i,y2=j;
                while(x1-1>=1&&y1-1>=1&&x2+1<=m&&y2+1<=n)
                {
                    x1--;y1--;x2++;y2++;
                    temp+=w[x1][y1]+w[x1][y2]+w[x2][y1]+w[x2][y2];
                    ans=max(ans,temp);
                }
            }
		}
		for(int i=1;i<m;i++)
		{
            for(int j=1;j<n;j++)
            {
                int x1=i,y1=j,x2=i+1,y2=j+1;
                int temp=w[x1][y1]+w[x1][y2]+w[x2][y1]+w[x2][y2];
                ans=max(ans,temp);
                while(x1-1>=1&&y1-1>=1&&x2+1<=m&&y2+1<=n)
                {
                    x1--;y1--;x2++;y2++;
                    temp+=w[x1][y1]+w[x1][y2]+w[x2][y1]+w[x2][y2];
                    ans=max(ans,temp);
                }
            }
		}
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
}
